enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Thelma Krug (Brazil) and Jim Penman (UK) co-chaired this contact group.

Delegates discussed the proposal for a draft decision on simplified modalities and procedures for small-scale A&R CDM activities and measures to facilitate the implementation of project activities, paragraph-by-paragraph.
On definitions of small-scale A&R CDM, JAPAN, with several Parties, and opposed by AOSIS, supported reference to average projected net anthropogenic greenhouse gas removals by sinks.
AOSIS, opposed by CHILE, JAPAN, and PERU, proposed deletion of text stating that projects will be exempt from, or subject to, paying a lower share of proceeds to the Protocol`s Adaptation Fund.

CANADA, with several Parties, and opposed by the EU and AOSIS, supported maintaining reference to reduced rates of the share of project proceeds to cover administrative expenses, noting that costs are the greatest barrier for low income communities.
Participants agreed to delete text encouraging host Parties to establish measures to facilitate implementation of small-scale A&R.
Text inviting assistance for capacity-building activities for the application and implementation of simplified modalities and procedures was agreed.
